title: Age of Shadows
description: Age of Shadows is the first in a four-part series from WinGate Chronicles. It is a Science Fiction adventure story. Filled with time travel and plot twists from the present and beyond. Ancient shadows of a more advanced race have awaited this moment in history to encircle the Earth, in order to rid the world of Mankind. However, a dysfunctional military family unknowingly now stands in the way as they learn to rebuild family loyalty. Join the adventure, as they find the fabric of everything they once knew starting to unravel around them.
author: Robert A. Foster
